p: Plaque reduction neutralization assays: Confluent cell monolayers were grown in 6 well plates and incubated with 5 µg of polyclonal β-actin or rabbit IgG, Axl or Hsp70 antibodies at 4°C for 1 h, rinsed with sterile PBS, and incubated with 10 5 pfu ZIKV particles, then processed as described above for plaque assays.
